players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso. Charlie is dead and Diana is the only one left to be the mafia. I investigated Diana last night and confirmed it."
Diana: "Diana is not the mafia. Bob is lying to protect himself because he knows he is the real mafia."
You: "Diana's claim is suspicious, but Bob's accusation is strong. If Bob is lying, why accuse Diana so directly? We should consider voting for Diana to test Bob's claim."
Bob: "I stand by my investigation. Diana is the mafioso. Charlie's death is proof. If you vote for me, you're letting the mafia win."
Diana: "Diana is not the mafia. Bob is trying to shift suspicion to me because he is the real threat. Trusting Bob will lead us to lose."
You: "Diana's deflection is too aggressive, and Bob's investigation claim matches the night's outcome. We should vote Diana out to confirm Bob's statement and protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. Charlie is dead and Diana is the only one left to be the mafia. I investigated Diana last night and confirmed it."
Diana: "Diana is not the mafia. Bob is lying to protect himself because he knows he is the real mafia."
Alice: "Diana's claim is suspicious, but Bob's accusation is strong. If Bob is lying, why accuse Diana so directly? We should consider voting for Diana to test Bob's claim."
You: "I stand by my investigation. Diana is the mafioso. Charlie's death is proof. If you vote for me, you're letting the mafia win."
Diana: "Diana is not the mafia. Bob is trying to shift suspicion to me because he is the real threat. Trusting Bob will lead us to lose."
Alice: "Diana's deflection is too aggressive, and Bob's investigation claim matches the night's outcome. We should vote Diana out to confirm Bob's statement and protect the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Diana
